attributes.action: implement their own royal commission and pay carers  at the same rate as the basic pension
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 1999 the royal commission said carers should be paid at the same rate as the basic pension. Eight years later this still hasn't happened, carers are treated worse than someone claiming job seekers allowance and the gap can only grow if thing don't change.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
